name: A Drop of Perspective
description:
A Drop of Perspective takes a look into what home, social, and work life might look like for a person suﬀering from Post Traumatic Stress Disorder (PTSD). Walk through a day in the life of Rollen Nightwing, a person who suﬀers from PTSD, and see how it eﬀects parts of life often unknown to those who do not suﬀer from this mental illness.

Wei Hu
